description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nHoodwink:
Enemies always have {CONDNAME_BUFF_TAUNT}. Enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIND} have a 50% chance to target {ACTION_provoking} allies with attacks and spells. This trait does not stack.
name: Snake Lace
